ValidationRule.description: This validation will check the conditions for activating the account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT($Setup.GlobalMute__c.AllValidationRuleDisabled__c), ISPICKVAL( Account_Status__c , "Active"), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Prospect Customer")), KYC_Completed__c = false, Have_Closed_Won_Opportunity__c =false )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The type should be prospect, KYC should be completed and should have at least one closed won opportunity
